apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this couple emoji features two figures, a woman with no skin tone and another with a light skin tone, embracing with a vibrant heart floating between them, all rendered with Apple’s signature 3D glossy effect. The smooth gradients and soft rounded edges of their figures and the heart create a warm and inviting scene, symbolizing partnership, deep affection, and strong bonds. It’s a beautiful way on Apple devices to express enduring love, commitment, or the joy of a shared connection in digital communication.
